scripts.dev-standalone-fast: concurrently -n "admin-api,admin,api,next,nextra,proxy" "yarn workspace admin-api dev-standalone" "yarn workspace admin dev-standalone" "yarn workspace api dev-standalone" "yarn workspace next-app dev-standalone" "yarn workspace nextra dev-standalone" "yarn workspace proxy dev-standalone"
scripts.prod-service: NODE_ENV=production pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && yarn monit
scripts.prod-standalone: NODE_ENV=production concurrently -n "admin-api,admin,api,next,nextra,proxy" "yarn workspace admin-api prod-standalone" "yarn workspace admin prod-standalone" "yarn workspace api prod-standalone" "yarn workspace next-app prod-standalone" "yarn workspace nextra prod-standalone" "yarn workspace proxy prod-standalone"
scripts.prepare-dev: node prepare.js && yarn workspace api prepare-dev && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude api run prepare-dev && yarn build
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude next-app --exclude electron-app --exclude nextra --exclude admin run build
scripts.package: yarn prepare-dev && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude electron-app run package
scripts.sync: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
scripts.test:all: NODE_ENV=development FORCE_COLOR=1 yarn workspaces foreach run test
scripts.test:global: NODE_ENV=development FORCE_COLOR=1 yarn workspace tests test
